sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import './App.css'; class App extends React.Component() { constructor() { super(); this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); this.state = { name: '', email: '', cpf: '', adress: '', city: '', /* state: '', typePlace: '', resume: '', job: '', jobDescription: '', */ } } handleChange({target}) { this.setState({ [target.name]: target.value }); }; render() { return (
